message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can always negotiate more in the future.
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me, 40% for you. We both get a good share.
I'm willing to go down to 70% but I think I deserve more than 40%. Let's be reasonable.
I can meet you closer to your offer, 55% for me, 45% for you. We're losing value each round.
